Wwise Unity Integration » Platform-Specific Information

Limitations: Windows 8

  • As of v2013.1, a remote connection is not possible for Windows 8 (Windows Store App) applications. Profiling by connecting the Wwise Authoring tool to a running Windows Store App integrated with Wwise SDK on a Windows 8 device is not available.
  • Windows Store Apps use regular Windows SoundBanks. There is no separate platform SoundBanks for Windows 8.
Generated on Wed Mar 18 16:05:20 2015 for Wwise Unity Integration by  1.6.3
